hero.title: Amazon Rainforest
hero.subtitle: Bird Species
hero.description: Explore the diverse bird species of the Amazon rainforest and their conservation status. Discover which species are thriving and which face the threat of extinction.

cta.title: Ready to Explore the Data?
cta.description: Dive into interactive visualizations and detailed information about each bird species, their habitats, and conservation efforts in the Amazon rainforest.
